title: Seismic Data Interpretation for Prospect ID
description: A geoscientist analyzes a new 3D seismic survey to identify potential hydrocarbon traps and define a drilling prospect.

tasks.description: Load the 3D seismic data volume and associated well log data into the interpretation software.
tasks.expected_outcome: All relevant data is loaded and quality-checked for consistency.

tasks.description: Interpret and map key geological horizons and faults across the seismic volume.
tasks.expected_outcome: Geoscientist accurately maps the structural framework of the area.

tasks.description: Generate a structural map of a target reservoir and identify potential closures (traps).
tasks.expected_outcome: A map showing potential hydrocarbon traps is created and high-graded.
